com.github.rmsy.channels.impl

Class SimpleChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rmsy.channels.impl.SimpleChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel

    public final class SimpleChannel
extends Object
implements Channel
    Simple implementation of Channel.

        consoleListening - Whether or not the console is listening.

        getFormat in interface Channel

        The channel's format.
        See Also:

      • setFormat

        public void setFormat(@Nonnull
             String format)
        Sets the channel's format (the string that appears before the message).
        Note: %s will be replaced with the sending user's display name. For example, if iamramsey had a display name of 'rmsy', and had a message directed to a channel with a format of [Z] <%s> , his message would be prepended in chat with "[Z] rmsy".
        Specified by:
        setFormat in interface Channel
        Parameters:
        format - The format.
